column1: Little Goat Diner////When we first got there
column2: there was only one couple in front of us
column3: but others started filing in quickly and soon it was crowded.  15 or so minutes or later
column4: the hostess stopped by to apologize and let us know she'd forgotten about us but that we'd have the next table which was being cleaned off.  We were seated about 5 minutes later
